about_the_game:
When the night falls upon the world, darkness gets viscous and prickly, drawing strength and life away from the unwary travelers. The offsprings of darkness hunt for those who cleverly surrounded their lair with light to banish the creatures away into the darkness.

The one who wakes up at dawn surrounded by the floating cursed island's ridges has a complex destiny. Their minutes of life might be numbered. The traveler is now forced to spend these minutes preparing for the upcoming fight against the dark.

Perhaps they can find a way to leave the island.

Research and Riddles

In this game you have to explore a large, hand-crafted world full of secrets, puzzles and traps. To get through the Earth's thickness and find a way to leave the cursed island.

The game offers you 2 types of gameplay: a platformer, with a side view, and a shooter with a top view, placing more emphasis on parkour and battles in different parts of the game, or on exploring mazes, respectively.

Items and crafting

It's up to you to decide exactly how to become stronger in this world. You can either find powerful weapons and equipment in caches around the world, or create it from resources yourself. In any case, the player has more than 80 items at his disposal, among which there are both melee / ranged weapons and unique accessories.

Time is running out

Don't lose your vigilance! Every minute counts. The longer you spend on the island, the more dangerous it becomes. Your goal is to find a balance between research and development, so that you can find a way to leave the cursed island, and not be too weak before the next wave of opponents...

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel 2.4 GHz, Amd FX-8350 or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256MB video memory, capable of shader model 2.0
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 52 MB available space

short_description: Search for secrets, solve puzzles, get ready to survive a series of dangerous nights in this action adventure full of challenges and difficulties. Will you be able to escape from the Cursed island?
supported_languages: English, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Spain, Ukrainian
